message.body: I have decided that despite my ########I would like to read your story. I guess my curiosity has won out. If it is not to late and if you have not changed your mind I would feel very lucky to receive a copy of your story.

It doesn't even come out until April! So no you haven't missed the boat. Like I said only the setting is borrowed, but I hope it brings you nice memories. It does for me. Give me your address and I'll send it along in a couple of months. I hope you're well and enjoying those muppet sheets!
The sheets have become worn with the years. They still provide warmth on a cold winters night,
I actually came across pictures of our trip today when I was looking for old photos for john's birthday.
I look at them every so often. It was the nicest trip I have ever been on.
I had beef tartar tonight an thought of it! I eat meat now.
You ate meat, I may have persuaded you in that direction. Life is short, there is no need not to enjoy it fully.
